mapper.select:
SELECT o.*, u.name as UserName, su.nick_name as createUserName, s.description as sampleDescription FROM orders o LEFT JOIN user u ON u.id =o.belong_user_id LEFT JOIN SYSTEM_USER su ON su.id =o.create_user_id LEFT JOIN samples s on o.sample_id= s.id WHERE 1=1
and u.mobile like "%"#{oq.mobile}"%"
and u.name like "%"#{oq.userName}"%"
and su.nick_name like "%"#{oq.createUserName}"%"
and u.id =#{oq.userId}
AND (DATE_FORMAT(o.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT( #{oq.createTimeFrom}, '%Y-%m-%d'))
AND (DATE_FORMAT(o.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT( #{oq.createTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d'))
ORDER BY o.deliver_progress asc,o.payment_progress asc,o.invoice_progress asc,o.create_date asc
mapper.update: update orders o set o.deliver_progress =#{deliver_progress}, o.modify_time =now() where o.id=#{id}
update orders o set o.invoice_progress =#{invoice_progress}, o.invoice_progress_remarks =#{invoice_progress_remarks}, o.modify_time=now() where o.id=#{id}
update orders o set o.payment_progress =#{payment_progress}, o.payment_method =#{payment_method}, o.payment_progress_remarks =#{payment_progress_remarks}, o.modify_time =now() where o.id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from orders_deliver_records where status =0 and order_id =#{order_id} ORDER by create_time desc
select * from orders_payment_records where status =0 and order_id =#{order_id} ORDER by create_time desc
